data.name: NYX: The Awakening
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the darkest nightmare. Prepare to challenge a goddess!

NYX: The Awakening is a blast of 80’s retro nostalgia. Discover the decade that defined modern pop-culture. It doesn’t matter if you’re a nerd or a jock—this game is an experience to remember!



Vicky was an ordinary teenager living in a typical American town—Mystic, CT.
There was nothing unusual about her until the day she came to face the trial of NYX, the ancient deity of the night who turned her life into a living nightmare.

Help Vicky overcome dangerous traps and stand against nightmarish enemies. Hidden behind this shady façade, the truth about her life waits to be discovered.


Experience unique gameplay based on a color swapping mechanic
Face nightmarish creatures from another dimension and enjoy epic combat action
Solve challenging platform and environmental puzzles
Immerse yourself in synth-wave music and neon-retro visuals, resembling a modern interpretation of classic Sci-Fi and Fantasy media from the 80's

data.short_description: Imprisoned by the ancient goddess Nyx, Vicky has to overcome her fears and fight the creatures that have invaded her town. Go back to the 80's and prepare yourself for a blast of neon nostalgia. Save your world and escape the nightmare!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
